title: Where can I find this font?
content:
Hi everyone,

I am looking for a font similar to this one that is free to download;

[http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Museo-Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425050013/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Museo-Slab "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Museo-Slab")

Thanks!
author: craigomahawx

comments.content: What do you mean? Museo Slab has two free weights. The rest are commercial.
